name: Spectra (itch) (Torquad)
description:
Spectra is a game about electromagnetic wavelengths! Solve puzzles by interacting with your environment by shooting light of various frequences at objects around you.

Each frequency of the gun serves a different purpose, use them all to make it to the end!

Controls:

Use number keys or scroll to change gun setting (displayed in bottom left corner)

1-Radio (Opera,Lullaby,Metal,Hack), 2-Microwave, 3-Infared, 4-Visible(Red,Green,Blue), 5-Ultraviolet, 6-Xray, 7-Gamma

Q/E - Cycle through alternate settings (Ex: Press 4 for red visible light, and E twice for blue visible light)

WASD - Movement

Space - Jump

Mouse - Aim & Shoot
